alert.note: Alert for Guayanilla; Penuelas; Sabana Grande; Yauco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 11 at 2:23PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Guayanilla, Penuelas, Sabana Grande and Yauco. * WHEN...Until 430 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 123 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding due to excessive runoff from the heavy rains. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Yauco, Guayanilla, Penuelas, Sabana Grande, Santo Domingo, Tallaboa Alta, Palomas, Indios, Magas Arriba, Lluveras, Liborio Negron Torres and Tallaboa. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
